original_title: Sri Lanka approves visa-free facility for citizens of 35 countries
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers has decided to grant visa-free access to Sri Lanka for citizens of 35 countries, including the UK, USA, Canada, Germany, Australia, Saudi Arabia, China, India, Russia, South Korea, and Japan.
This policy will be in effect from October 1, 2024, for a period of six months.
